item.title: By: tratch
item.dc:creator: tratch
item.description: In Guild Wars the other night I was in a group with some people and this guy whispered me asking for some gold. Out of curiosity, I asked him how much he needed and he said "30 plat". I lol'd, told him 'no', but he flipped out and started yelling and eventually quit.
item.content:encoded: In Guild Wars the other night I was in a group with some people and this guy whispered me asking for some gold. Out of curiosity, I asked him how much he needed and he said “30 plat”. I lol’d, told him ‘no’, but he flipped out and started yelling and eventually quit.

item.title: By: Tim
item.dc:creator: Tim
item.description: I just ... don't get it. I had someone randomly begging for a specific item from me. What would make you think that I even had that item? Does my priest really look like a miner/blacksmith?
item.content:encoded: I just … don’t get it. I had someone randomly begging for a specific item from me. What would make you think that I even had that item? Does my priest really look like a miner/blacksmith?
